entry.title: AttenuatorX - Milestone #100: Design PCB for XTest1
entry.content:
• Due date changed from 12/27/2012 to 12/29/2012
  • Status changed from New to In Progress
  • Start date changed from 12/24/2012 to 12/26/2012
  • % Done changed from 0 to 10
  • Estimated time changed from 8.00 to 12.00

Began associating components with their packages and very basic organizing of the PCB.

entry.title: AttenuatorX - Milestone #100: Design PCB for XTest1
entry.content:
• % Done changed from 10 to 30
  • Estimated time changed from 12.00 to 30.00

Majority of parts are now placed.

The major problem at this point is finding a decent enclosure for this project. I want to keep the RF path as short as possible, but finding just the right box/case/enclosure is turning out to be tricky. I may just have to settle on something sub-par, which wouldn't be too terrible, since this is only a test project for R&D toward the final product.

entry.title: AttenuatorX - Milestone #100: Design PCB for XTest1
entry.content:
• Due date changed from 12/29/2012 to 12/30/2012
  • Status changed from In Progress to Closed
  • % Done changed from 30 to 100
  • Estimated time changed from 30.00 to 18.00

Completed PCB for XTest1
